short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protecto helps you remove dangerous and malicious extensions that bog down your browser and leave you open to attacks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Protect your browser from dangerous extensions! Speed up your browser and make it a safer space for all your activities.

Finds, reveals, and squashes pesky and malicious extensions hiding in your browser and enhances browsing experience.

FAQ:
How much does Protecto cost?
Protecto is free to use and doesn't require any personal details to sign up. Let us know how we're doing so we can make a better product for you.

Do you share any of my information? Why do you request several permissions?
We do not collect or share any of your personal information. Your privacy is very important to us. All of the permissions we request are the minimum required to make sure we don't miss any dangerous extension trying to find its way into your browser.

How often should I test my extensions?
As long as you're following the rules of safe browsing, there's not much to worry about. We suggest a weekly scan, just to be on the safe side.

Privacy policy: https://goprotecto.com/privacy.pdf
For any questions and issues, contact us at: support@goprotecto.com
